item.title: Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth
item.description:
About This Game



EPIC EMOTIONAL DRAMA
Two larger-than-life heroes brought together by the hand of fate, or perhaps something more sinister…

Ichiban Kasuga, an unstoppable underdog who’s no stranger to crawling up from rock bottom, and Kazuma Kiryu, a broken man facing down his last days.



BEST-IN-CLASS RPG ACTION
Experience one-of-a-kind combat with dynamic, fast-paced RPG battles where the battlefield becomes your weapon, and anything goes. Adapt your party’s skills to the situation with outlandish jobs and customizations to strategically subdue enemies with over-the-top moves.



INFINITE ADVENTURE
Live it up in Japan and explore all that Hawaii has to offer in an adventure so big it spans the Pacific. Unforgettable moments await at every step of the journey with a unique mix of quests and activities to enjoy at your leisure.



Deluxe Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more

Ultimate Edition Content

- Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth game
- Master Vacation Bundle: Explore a bonus dungeon, get special Sujimon, resort guests, outfits, new game+ & more
- Assorted Outfit Bundle: Customize your party's look with outfits & swimwear
- Sujimon & Resort Bundle: Get legendary Sujimon, resort guests and special boosters
- Yakuza CD Collection Set: Increase your in-game playlist with classic karaoke tracks

item.title: Summon Masters
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card and board game with the following features:

Deck Building: Players can build their own decks to battle with. Depending on different strategies and opponents, players can choose different cards to counter.

Tactical Gameplay: The game uses a 3x10 chessboard, and players can freely place cards to fight. Players need to develop tactics and arrange card positions and usage order within limited space.

Different Professions: Players can choose freely from four professions - swordsman, mage, monk, and archer. Each profession has different characteristics and skills, and players can choose according to their preferences and tactical needs.

Competitive Battles: Players can battle with other players after building their decks, and it is fun to fight with other people. Through battles with other players, players can improve their strength and tactical skills.

Team Dungeons: In addition to fighting against other players, players can also team up with others to challenge high-difficulty dungeons. Players need to defeat powerful bosses through cooperation and strategy to get more rewards and cards.

Special Challenges: Players can participate in special rules challenges and use their intelligence to defeat other players. These special rules make the game more interesting and challenging, and players need to constantly think and try new strategies.

Fast-paced: Each game is fast-paced (within 5 minutes), and can be played in short fragments of time. The fast pace of the game allows players to enjoy the game in a short time, while also being able to play at any time and anywhere.

item.title: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

Take the helm of a classic Russian locomotive, discover the raw beauty and wildness of Siberia and try to survive on the longest railway line in the world. This is the Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator. A game for real adventurers!



Complete the tutorial and the first kilometers of the route for free.



The Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator offers amazing rail and survival challenges on real Russian dangerous routes. Feel what it is like to put your hands at the helm of a powerful freight locomotive and explore the untouched natural landscape that is sure to delight you.

Prologue features:

  • Detailed simulation of driving a VL10 locomotive - the locomotive control is slightly simplified.
  • Locomotive repair system - Manage and replace locomotive parts that are constantly wearing out.
  • Train traffic simulation - Follow rail signs and signals to avoid derailment or damage to a part of the locomotive.
  • Work system - Earn by completing transport orders.
  • Game modes (Survival) and (Simulator). It is recommended to play in the (Survival) mode. This is the leading game mode that is constantly being developed.
    For players who are not interested in survival mechanics, a simple Simulator mode is available.
  • Mafia system - Complete missions for the mafia to earn extra money.
  • Survival system with statistics of hunger, thirst, alcohol, hangover, disease and hypothermia - Eat and drink to avoid death.
    Keep the right temperature so you don't freeze.
  • Shooting system - Use your weapons for hunting and self-defense.
  • Purchase and sales system - Buy various items, food, tools, weapons and ammunition.
  • Locomotive inspection mode - Inspect the condition of locomotive parts and replace them in time to avoid damage.
  • Dynamic weather system with day and night cycle - Survive extreme weather conditions.
  • Route from (Novosibirsk-West) to (Novosibirsk-Main) - scale 1:1. Buy the full version with the route from (Novosibirsk-West) to (Krasnoyarsk).
  • Police system - A corrupt militia watches over your movements.
  • Much more to discover.

item.title: The Universim
item.description:
About This Game

WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH THE POWER?

🔵Play God!

Guide your fledgling sentient species (lovingly called “nuggets”) from Stone Age cave painters to star-faring explorers.

🔵Wield godly power

Command more than 15 godly powers to guide, protect — or discipline — your followers. Create devastating tornadoes, smite naughty followers with lightning bolts, or shake and sunder the very earth.

🔵Watch your Nuggets grow and thrive

Observe Nuggets' every move as they work and fight to survive.

🔵Evolve and advance through the ages

Research more than 200 technological and societal advancements.

🔵Expand your power and colonize the galaxy

Discover and colonize a galaxy of procedurally generated planets, each with unique ecosystems and challenges to conquer.

🔵Manage delicate ecosystems

Manage the delicate balance of planetary ecosystems to help nuggets thrive. Your decisions and your followers’ ' actions influence global climates and have real environmental consequences. (Try not to kill them in an ecological disaster — well, unless you want to, of course.)

🔵Delve into the deeper mystery of your existence

Unravel the layers of a deeper cosmic story that challenges your perception of who and what you are — and reveals unexpected twists!

About This Game:


The Universim is a strategy city builder game with “God” elements where you guide a civilization (Nuggets) from the Stone Age to the Space Age. Manage resources, dynamic challenges, and ensure your Nuggets can survive, thrive, and spread to the stars.



The Universim features more than 200 research perks that will help you to shape your civilization. Be as benevolent or malevolent as you like to drive nuggets to evolve, advance, and expand. (Even the best civilizations need an occasional smiting).
Every planet in The Universim is procedurally generated and offers unique characteristics and challenges, ensuring that every world and every game is unique and engaging. Ecological balance and resource management are critical to success. Nuggets have their own needs and behaviors you must attend to. Your guidance will shape how they deal with conflicts, natural disasters, alien creatures, and other civilizations. Their growth and evolution depends on you!








This game published by Crytivo

item.title: 100 Capitalist Cats
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2779640/100_Capitalist_Cats__Extra_Content/?utm_source=WidgetTop

🐱💼🐾 WELCOME TO 100 CAPITALIST CATS – THE BEST HIDDEN OBJECTS GAME! 🌆💰💵

🤑 Join the cutest adventure in the Wall Street, New York, heart of capitalism! 🏙️ Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of architecture as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. 🎨
😸Test your attention and observation skills in this cozy and delightful hidden object game 😊
Each cat is more charming than the last, and every discovery brings a smile to your face.

🐈🕵️‍♂️ Can you find them all? 🕵️‍♂️🐈

⚙️ Key Features ⚙️

  • 🎮 1 Level of Wall Street location
  • 🐈 100 Hidden Cats
  • 🎵 Awesome Soundtrack
  • 🎨 High Quality Resolution Artworks
  • 🥇 Achievements
  • 🌗 Brightness Settings
  • ⌛️ SpeedRun Mode (Timer)
  • 💾 Progress Saves
  • 🔍 Zoom
  • 😺 Real Meow Sounds!
  • 💥 Combo Counter!
  • 👫 Community
  • 🌐 No Text

🏆 START YOUR AMAZING JOURNEY IN THE WORLD OF CATS RIGHT NOW 🏆

Don't miss out on the cutest and exciting puzzle game ever! Come to 100 Capitalist Cats and start your amazing adventure today!

😻🎁DLC List for this game🎁😻


✅😻 Follow our Dev Page! 😻✅



https://store.steampowered.com/app/2687200/100_London_Cats/?utm_source=CapitalistBot

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2743080/100_Capitalist_Cats/?utm_source=CapitalistBot

item.title: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608270/Intravenous_2/


Step into the shoes of Gideon, a ruthless mercenary who cares about nothing but his wealth. Set two months before the events of Intravenous 2, you will take on seemingly simple jobs, the effects of which will ripple out and affect the main game's protagonist. But why should Gideon care? He's just in it for the money.

Key Features


  • Stealth or Firepower: the choice is yours. Sneak through shadows, turn off the lights, pick doors, or unleash a hail of bullets. The game will adapt to your play style.
  • Customize Your Skills: develop your skills the way you want to, whether it's mastering the art of stealth or becoming a gunslinging virtuoso.
  • Bullet Time: Gideon is no stranger to stimulants that enhance his cognitive abilities - bending time to give him the edge in tense situations.
  • Vast Arsenal: choose from firearms, gadgets, and a variety of ammo types to creatively tackle the challenge
  • Weapon Modification: personalize each firearm with suppressors, laser sights, and more, tailoring your arsenal to the task at hand.
  • Responsive AI: engage in intense combat with enemies that react to your actions, take cover, use tactics and call for backup.

item.title: Artifact Seeker:Prologue
item.description:
About This Game


The difference between the prologue version and the official version
There is a special artifact in the prologue
Characters: 2 in the prologue, at least 5 in the official version
Maps: 2 in the prologue, 3 in the final version.
Systems: Tavern, Marketplace, and Endless Mode will be added to the game.
Artifacts: More artifacts will be added to the game.
Skills: More skills will be added in the official version.
Affixes: More Affixes will be added in the official version.
Events: There will be more interesting Events in the official version.
Progress: No need to worry, all progress will be carry into the official version.


Artifact Seeker is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game. A game of gods, with Aurorium as the board, And all the mortals as their pawns and swords. You can obtain artifacts by slaying corrupted enemies, collecting gold to exchange it for artifacts at mysterious merchants. How to use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods? to end the game of gods or to become a god yourself. Artifact Seeker, Your choice.



Dozens of evolvable skills, extreme sprint dash, and the ultimate special skill to slay enemies!



Intense paced battles, you can buy artifacts to boost your power after each battle!



Hundreds of different artifacts with matching skills to create a wide variety of bond Synergy, and utilize the power of the synergy to challenge higher level enemies! [/b]



RPG like Events, diverse choices, adventuring dungeons, exploring magical worlds, befriend different heroes and unlock new characters!



Hundreds of affixes and attributes, dozens of different meta-progressions, weapon unlocking and strengthening, and sharing your own unique artifacts with your pals! There's new contents to experience after every run!



Explore the world and discover the hidden secrets behind the story!

item.title: Frostrain
item.description:
About This Game

Roam the frozen world


Climate change has turned the world white and frozen, and the only thing moving on the planet is you, your passengers, and your train. It's a dead world, but ironically, it's all the more fascinating for it. A vivid landscape awaits you to explore.

Keep your passengers happy


The passengers on your train will work diligently at your command, but be careful: if you don't manage their happiness properly, they might throw you off the train.

Build your own train with card decks


Each time you pass through a city, you'll be able to add new train cars by launching a heavy lift drone. Be careful with each choice you make. If you are lucky, you'll be able to build a better, more synergized, happily-ever-after train deck, but it won't always go as you planned.

Reach the Promised Land


Lead your passengers in search of the Promised Land, somewhere on the eastern edge of the world. But the journey to the Promised Land isn't all smooth and pleasant. You'll have to pass through toxic areas, and a severe storm is brewing behind you. Pay attention to your passengers' happiness levels and lead them safely to the Promised Land. The journey is in your hands.

item.title: NIDUS
item.description:
About This Game

NIDUS is a CHALLENGING Split-Stick Arcade Experience

Designed for those who enjoy mastery of stimulating and highly demanding gameplay. Control a Symbiotic Flower and Wasp in Unison, as you struggle to survive a surreal and threatening ecosystem. Immerse yourself in full throttle simulation with Single Player, or try to survive together with a friend in hectic Local Co-Op.



KEY FEATURES

  • Single Player or Co-Op
  • No-Hit score multiplier
  • Evolve flower for defense, wasp for attack
  • Worlds upgrade as you choose your path
  • Nightmarish bosses with exalted forms
  • Unlockable difficulties
  • 20 - 30 minute runs
  • Competitive leaderboard
  • Surreal hand animated visuals
  • Gamepad or Mouse/Keyboard supported



PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: NIDUS CONTAINS INTENSE HAND ANIMATED VISUALS THAT FEATURE EXPLOSIVE MOVEMENTS, CRAWLING PATTERNS, AND FLASHING COLORS

item.title: Gran Carismo
item.description:
About This Game

"Gran Carismo" takes players on a thrilling racing adventure inspired by the story of Ferruccio, a former Italian racer who, along with his family, migrated to the USA many years ago. Originally a mechanic specializing in racing cars, Ferruccio faced a stroke of misfortune when he accidentally wrecked the Rosso 50 during a routine inspection.

In an effort to remedy their father's predicament, Ferruccio's children, Mario and Giulia, decide to participate in the underground racing tournament known as "Gran Carismo," held in various countries. The ultimate prize at stake is none other than the coveted Rosso 50, the very car their father had inadvertently damaged.

As players delve into the game, they can expect:

Diverse Tracks: Experience the thrill of racing on multiple tracks set in different countries. Each location presents its own set of challenges, adding an exciting dimension to the gameplay.

Variety of Cars: Choose from a selection of over 20 high-performance cars, each with its unique attributes and handling characteristics.

Multiple Race Types: Engage in a variety of race types, including time trials, circuit races, off-road challenges, and drift competitions. The game offers a dynamic racing experience with a mix of driving styles to keep players on their toes.

"Gran Carismo" immerses players in an intense and competitive racing environment, combining the excitement of illegal underground races with a compelling narrative. Get ready to navigate challenging tracks, outmaneuver rivals, and claim the grand prize – the Rosso 50 – in this adrenaline-fueled racing game.

item.title: Time to Strike
item.description:
About This Game




Time to Strike mixes Binding of Issac crazy synergies with more streamlined gameplay with a gentle sprinkle of Vampire Survivors. Runs are fast and items are made to synergize with each other!




There are tons of build options to experiment with. Become summon master, create critter army, demolish enemies with massive explosions, fill screen with bullets or anything in between, it is up to you!

Key Features:


  • Fast runs
  • 30+ unique weapons
  • 30+ powerful mods to modify your weapons
  • 80+ fun relics to experiment with
  • Tons of starting options to play around
  • 5 boss fights

item.title: Please, Touch The Artwork 2
item.description:
About This Game

Disclaimer: This is a short game made in 6 months. It's 100% FREE(no ads, no dlc's), made by a solo dev in honour of James Ensor’s 75 year remembrance.



Touch the artwork and help a lost skeleton artist find its way home in a surreal, hand-painted universe.

Collect hidden objects for its quirky inhabitants, solve casual puzzles, and restore cracks in the fabric of the paintings.

This slow paced relaxing adventure was carefully crafted from works by James Ensor, a Belgian pioneer in the world of Modern Art.

Features:

  • Hidden object adventure
  • 5 unique worlds
  • Hints when stuck
  • Casual point & click gameplay
  • Zoom-in for extra details
  • Real hand-painted art
  • Atmospheric relaxing sound
  • Silly and quirky
  • Slow-paced & relaxing
  • Fit for ages 12-99

item.title: Fantasy Adventure Builder
item.description:
About This Game

Fantasy Adventure Builder (TM) is the digital version of the famous book “Tome of Adventure Design”. It contains hundreds of tables that help you come up with ideas for quests, adventurers, monsters, and anything related to High Fantasy TT RPGs.

In addition, it features the Table Designer tool with which you can create your own generators and use them in your games as you play, either online or around the table. No coding is needed, so get ready to bring your ideas to life.

Tome of Adventure Design - Fantasy Adventure Builder



The Adventure Design Tool lets you generate results from the Tome of Adventure Design with a single click of the mouse, and browse through multiple table-results all at once. Sub-tables are rolled and displayed automatically.

In addition, you are allowed to reroll the whole results, certain results but also even partially reroll certain words until you get exactly what you were looking for.
A vast list of tables awaits you to generate anything you like, and all of them are written by award-winning author Matt Finch and Mythmere games.

The Notebook & Exports



You will be able to use the Adventure Design Tool interactively, generating results from several linked tables all at once. As you work you are allowed to keep results to your “Notebook”.

In the Notebook, you are allowed to further edit your results and when ready you can export in txt or PDF.

Create Your Own Generators



The Table Designer Tool lets you create your own generators for anything you can imagine, such as encounter tables, NPCs, and name-generators, but also super complex ones.

We provide you with an easy-to-use tool but if you are familiar with html you can go that way as well.

-You can copy-paste from an Excel or CSV.
-You can use any AI Chat to paste results to your tables.
-You can save your Generators and use them later on in your games.
-You can share your generators through Steam Workshop.

The Tutorial



Although Fantasy Adventure Builder is easy to use, we provide you with a full tutorial video which you can watch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQ2qf3qaARA&t=3s

Although no code is needed to create your generators and all functionalities work with UI Buttons, we allow you to use HTML and our own pseudo-language as you type. You can find all the commands in the app’s menu.

Premium DLC



We will be adding premium downloadable content to the "My Generators" section as we go. This premium DLC will include a generator for the history of magical items written by Matt Finch, and other tables not included in the Tome of Adventure Design. Other table writers will also be contributing to this set of tables and generators.

Commercial License



If you plan to use the software on a monetized YouTube channel or show raw output on a monetized blog, you'll need to get the commercial use license. Feel free to contact Brave Alice Games.

Most people don't need a commercial license; you DON'T need it for making adventures for use at your own gaming table. Even publishing your adventure for money, as long as it doesn't contain text taken directly from the tables, is also perfectly fine. Using the software on a non-monetized YouTube channel is permitted (even with images of the user interface).

item.title: First Gen
item.description:
About This Game

In a world where technology and biology are one, the aumentations of the human body are massive and the war never seems to end. Our hero will try to get his life back on track in this visual novel filled with action, intrigue and secrets. Follow the journey of Markus Orwell, a First Generation soldier of the North Alliance while he tries to solve a painful crime and get his life back on track.

Navigate through branching paths, multiple endings, where each decision crafts a different journey. Uncover diverse paths as you shape and embody your own unique story. Craft your own legacy!

item.title: At His Grave
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to this story of regret and death, the world is clumsy, every object is a child's doodle, they are filled with the most simple thoughts, and the mystery of death.
We rush through life, rushing out to appointments, rushing out to errands, rushing out to a long trip, rushing to forget the people in the door. Suddenly one day found that I found that I would never see him again, I ignored all the signs that he was going to leave, ignored the information that life was passing. At this time, my mind just keeps circulating those most regrettable pictures. If we could go back in time, could we find this information and make up for these regrets?
Each regret screen is a level, and you will experience the whole process from ignoring to losing. You will also experience the ability to travel back in time, and I hope you take advantage of this opportunity to make up for some small regrets.

This game commemorates him in heaven.

Basic gameplay:
Time backward-looking secret room decryption game, analyze character dialogue, combine the basic knowledge of the real world, find out the key to decryption, and leave the room. But in any case, each level will have regrettable clues not found, get the ability to go back to each level, find the final way to break the game, make up for each regret.
1. In each level, the player is in a hurry to leave the room and solve puzzles by clicking on items, moving items, dialog boxes, cutscene ICONS, subtitles, etc.
2. Analyze the dialogue of the characters to find the way to solve the puzzle. Each level in the game needs to be cleared twice, and the solution of the second time is different from the first time, which requires players to explore by themselves. Attention, please! Every dialogue in the game has meaning!
3. Each level will be followed by a time description, which is related to the final plot.
4. Time Backtracking ability: After obtaining the time backtracking ability, the backtracking button will appear in the lower left corner, and you can switch levels at any time by clicking the button in the lower left corner. Even if you are decrypting a level and suddenly think of another level clue, you can switch levels at any time, and then switch back to the previous level, the progress will remain the same, no need to start the level again.
5. Backtracking success: After finding missing clues and making up for regrets, 'success' will appear in the upper left corner, indicating successful backtracking. Players need to retrace the success of each level in order to enter the next story.
6. Clearance conditions: Successful back to each level, after watching the story can be cleared.

Finally, after playing, please share your thoughts and experiences in the comments section. The reviewer who touches the author the most will be rewarded.

item.title: Yatagarasu Enter the Eastward
item.description:
About This Game

Overview
Following "Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm", "Yatagarasu Enter the Eastward" introduces a new parallel world with new characters and gameplay meticulously optimized for your enjoyment. This game preserves the classic 2D fighting game format and features high-quality pixel graphics and a simple gameplay style that anyone can pick up.

Story
Dec 25th, 1926. The imperial era name transitions to "Kobun” and seems to herald the dawn of a new period in history.

But behind the scenes, a Japanese nationalist revolutionary group has staged a coup d’etat with the goal of restoring "the divine nation of Japan." The revolutionaries acted swiftly, seizing control of the Prime Minister’s residence, the police department, major corporations, and newspapers.

Struggling to react, former government forces initiated a secret plan to eliminate key figures involved in the coup through an assassination program known as "Yatagarasu." This covert opeation was assigned to the "Iga Clan", a ninja clan that exists today as an intelligence agency and who are also known as "Government Dogs."

New Characters
Ugui (VA: Shinobu Matsumoto)
An elderly butler who serves the last descendant of the now-deposed Suitoku royal family. Wugui was retained by the former king, but his demeanor and skills are uncharacteristic of a butler and his background is shrouded in mystery. He intends to use the current unrest in Japan to manipulate the government and restore the royal family.
"It's time to purge."

Ao Tienyi (VA: Yumiri Hanamori)
The last living descendant of the Suitoku royal family. When the royal family was dethroned, she was spirited away by Wugui and lived in hiding. She has agreed to Wugui’s plan to use the current unrest in Japan to rebuild her former kingdom. Tienyi is naturally timid, but decided to take on the role of the "bright and cheerful princess" after being deeply moved by Kotaro's acting.
"Have I become the lady you wish for?"

Sistan (VA: Hisako Kanemoto)
Originally an automated doll designed to bring joy to people, Sistan was reprogrammed by a certain nation to become a secret operative. She was dispatched to Japan on a mission to locate a ‘Divine Drive’ said to be able to predict any event or grant wishes.
"I will execute my orders... and eliminate all obstacles..."

About This Game
"Yatagarasu Enter the Eastward" is an original 2D fighting game. Our goal was to provide easy-to-understand gameplay so many people can enjoy the fun of fighting games. We deliberately kept the gameplay simple and focused on building a strong base around the fundamentals of fighting games and enabling players to enjoy the fun, core aspects of fighting games.

・An Original 2D Fighting Game
An original 2D fighting game designed in the pixel art style which has become less common over the years. We paid close attention to designing appealing character designs and animations that can only be expressed in old-school pixel art.

・Core "blocking" System
Yatagarasu's core gameplay mechanic is the blocking / "BL" system, which centers on deflecting your opponent's attacks and counterattacking. This simple system makes it easy to understand and apply strategy in the game.

・Simple Game System
For a modern fighting game, Yatagarasu is very straightforward. Our goal was to create a game that anyone can pick up and play but also offers deep gameplay.

・Commentary System
In live settings, fighting games have an off-screen appeal that includes fun smack talk, cheering, and commentary to engage the audience. To recreate this lively off-screen excitement, we’ve integrated a commentary system into the game. This is a unique feature where real-time commentary and hype play out as matches develop.

・Network Battle Support
For "Yatagarasu Enter the Eastward", we've implemented our own netcode from scratch. You can enjoy smooth online battles with minimal network lag. This game includes a variety of features such as ranked matches, lobby matches, playing while waiting, and spectating. You can also use a website (Yatagarasu News) to check the current match status from your smartphone.

・Long Production Period and Intricate Improvements
We’ve worked on the production and updating this game for for a long time, constantly improving the quality while listening to feedback from the fighting game community.

item.title: Catch My Color
item.description:
About This Game

Catch My Color is a game that solve puzzled by applying the appropriate colors to the sights of Korea in black and white.

Attractions in korea


The background of the game is a Korean landmark.
Discover hidden elements in famous places!

Hidden Objects


The game's puzzles are essentially hidden object finds.
Use the clues below to help you figure out which places to paint and which colors to use!

Hint Tickets


If the clues are too difficult, you can use hint tickets.
Get hint tickets by coloring in various parts of the map!

Various Colors


It's not necessarily to paint correct color, you can color it you like.
Depending on the color you paint, you will be able to see the attraction with a completely new feel.

item.title: Toytopia
item.description:
About This Game



Toytopia is a first person 3D horror survival adventure game that takes place in a abandoned amusing children's attraction.

Survive the abandoned levels of the most happiest place on earth.

Welcome to Toytopia, where childhood innocence clashes with bone-chilling horror! Uncover the sinister secrets lurking behind the cheerful facades of your favorite toys in this spine-tingling adventure. Explore the abandon ruins of Toytopia experience the wonders that were once seen at this once amusing attraction. Always check behind your back because something is always lurking near you, meet the varying cast members of Toytopia and try your best to survive.






Embark on a twisted journey through a whimsical toy store turned nightmarish playground. Face off against a legion of haunted mascots brought to life, each with their own demented personality and nightmarish abilities. Every step forward brings you closer to the heart of darkness and to uncover the secrets that lies in Toytopia.

Explore the ruins of Toytopia, which once was a happy place.

Each room with their own unique patterns and challenges.

Unlock and uncover the mysteries that lies within.

Solve challenging puzzles, deadly platforms and much more.

Discover rooms that were once known to make any child happy!

Filled with threats lurking at every corner.

Waiting for the right moment to attack, you always have to stay alerted!



Navigate through eerie aisles and solve mind-bending puzzles while eluding the grasp of these monstrous playthings. Unravel the mystery shrouding Toytopia's grim transformation and confront the malevolent force pulling the strings. Toytopia is your one-stop place for happiness.. and terror. Will you survive?

item.title: Firefrost
item.description:
About This Game

Firefrost is a turn-based combat game about snow clearing. Use your flamethrower to burn through the snow, your enemies, and reach soup. Upgrade your flamethrower to unlock new tactical options. If you die, just get up again, no progress lost. Chase the SSoup rank, unlock more upgrades.

Key features:

  • Flamethrower: the solution to the problem is always to burn the problem. The crux? You need your thrower to aim at the problem.
  • Make your own thrower: use upgrades for longer range, double shots (throws?) and exploding enemies to enable new tactical options. Put together your own combination of upgrades, and strive to find the perfect combination.
  • Chase ranks: learn enemy patters, plan your attacks and perfect your tactics. Become a tactical snow clearing elite and get that SSoup rank.
  • Modifiers: want a harder challenge? Use a modifier to limit your ammo or corrupt the world.
  • High quality sustenance: soup.

item.title: Buckshot With Friends
item.description:
About This Game

Take turns firing a shotgun either with the dealer or with your friends.

Unpredictable Rounds:

Every round is unique, with a shotgun chambered with a random assortment of live and dummy rounds. Strategy and luck are both your allies as no two rounds will ever play out the same way.

Play With Friends Or Dealer:

Invite your friends to duel or play against the dealer and try your luck at the table.

item.title: Pricolage -IDOLIZED-
item.description:
About This Game

Cyberstalking game Pricolage -IDOLIZED-



Cyberstalk the popular K-pop idol!
Pricolage -IDOLIZED- is a short adventure game in which you search around an Instagram-like social media platform for traces of Sena–a K-pop idol at the height of fame–after her disappearance. Wander through an ocean of darkness and greed–the internet–in order to locate her!


■Use posts to find out what people are up to in their offline lives!

Follow your To-Do List and click on anything on-screen that catches your eye to obtain search words.



■The internet knows all!

Use the search words you obtain to deduce Sena’s whereabouts.
Put your cyberstalking prowess to the test and see if you can uncover all the idol’s ins and outs.


■Gather evidence!

The pictures in Sena’s posts just might lead you to identifying a culprit.
Oh, but what’s this? A pic of Sena undressing? There are more important things to find…or are there? Gather any evidence of Sena’s whereabouts!


■Multiple endings!

Scour the internet and perhaps you’ll find hidden endings. How things play out is up to you.

Character Introduction




■セナ：
A member of the K-pop idol group 7uster who debuted after the audition television show Seven Angels.
Kind-hearted and hard-working, yet just a smidge naive. She became a K-pop idol to make her dream of bringing a smile to everyone’s face come true.

Is Sena happy...?

Finding information from the internet filled with lies and deceit will be your path to the truth.
See through until the end with what happens with Sena.

item.title: Doodle Harmony Ghosts
item.description:
About This Game


Doodle Harmony Ghosts is a beautiful Point and Click game.
100 pairs of doodles are waiting for you to match them.

Relax with a spectacular original soundtrack!

Found 2 matching ones? Drag them to their counterpart.

Features

🧑🏻‍🤝‍🧑🏻 1 Level, 100 pairs of doodles
♾️ Procedural Level Generation
🎶 Radio System to choose your music
⏰ Timer Mode with leaderboards

item.title: Brown Trouble
item.description:
About This Game

You are the king... the king of the toilet facilities! Your task is to correctly direct the pipes through which the excrement of the courtiers passes, but remember that every delay leads to your dismissal. And of course, our pipes often break.

Brown Trouble - a 2D classic puzzle game. Control with the left mouse button, click on the pieces of pipes, turning them in the desired direction. Once you can adjust one of the pipes correctly, everything will be fine until the pipe becomes clogged again, and people continuing to walk only make the situation worse.

Control:
Left Mouse Button - rotate pipes

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Speed game
- Difficulty

item.title: Abnimality
item.description:
About This Game

The animals in the forest acquired grenade launchers and created crazy chaos in the forest, destroying everything around and exploding the earth under their paws. The only thing you need to do is blow everything up in such a way as to reach the end of the level first!

Abnimality is a platformer game with explosions and a physical world, where the player uses explosions to control his character, who must jump to the end of the level before the others.

Control:
Left Mouse Button - shooting

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Physical World
- Difficulty

item.title: Gambit Shifter
item.description:
About This Game





Gambit Shifter is a cozy and chill puzzler for chess experts and novices alike.

Take control of just a single piece and traverse through levels where every move counts.
Shift your form and unlock new, varied movements as you clear your path to the enemy King!

The game includes 80+ hand-crafted levels, a focus-inspiring original soundtrack, and requires no prior chess knowledge.





Jump straight into the action with a quick, simple tutorial, and puzzle your way through 80+ unique levels, exploring gorgeous color scapes and putting your strategic skill to the test.





Discover new mechanics as you traverse through levels - from shifting platforms to secret passageways. Mix up your plan of attack and outsmart the obstacles guarding the King!





  • Play through 80+ hand-crafted levels.
  • Control a single pawn and use your cunning to defeat the King!
  • Made a mistake? You can always undo your moves!
  • Traverse a relaxing colourscape, designed for chess experts and beginners alike!
  • Hone your thoughts with our original, deep-focus soundtrack.

item.title: THE BELLIGERENCE
item.description:
About This Game

This game was developed for one player with the aim of differentiating itself from existing fighting games.
The closest feeling to a real battle in the history of existing games.
You can attack by moving the right stick up, down, left, right, up and down, and you can use more powerful moves by using the R button and the R trigger.
You can avoid attacks by moving in the direction of the opponent's attack.
Each time you attack, your stamina will decrease, and if it decreases further, it will decrease to a negative value.

There is a mode to fight the CPU, and five difficulty levels from Very Easy to Very Hard.
Watch out for and avoid your opponent's big attack and turn to counterattack!
Can you beat the belly hard?

item.title: Legend of Stars
item.description:
About This Game

Balance ball parkour shooting game, after sealing the demon King for more than a thousand years, the demon domain seal has become very weak, and the magic pieces of the demon King have transformed into various evil gods,
Occupy the ancient ruins and cities, absorb the energy of the planet, weaken the boundary of the planet, so that the demon king in the depths of Purgatory can take advantage of the entire earth.
The game has dozens of bullets, magic and pets to choose from, as the level increases, bullets, magic, pet power will become stronger, the protagonist's attack power and health will also increase

Game features
1 Rich terrain mechanism with balanced ball parkour mode to increase the sense of challenge
2 Using the latest technology, light and shadow technology increases the immersion of the scene
3 Open large maps contain small maps, which combine linear and random to increase the degree of free exploration
4 Different scenarios contain different tasks, which increases the degree of goal
5 different types of bullets, magic combinations
6 Bullets, magic, can change form, power, increase nutrition as you level up

item.title: Steel Manticore
item.description:
About This Game

Steel Manticore is a 3D FPS.

In the Saraif Republic, the government is on the verge of collapse. Play as a Republican Guard robot pilot to prevent an anti-government uprising.
Use main guns, machine guns, rockets, missiles and grenades to defeat your enemies.

A total of 8 stages including practice stages.

It also supports VR.
Please turn off the VR device when switching to non-VR.

◆ Key config with keyboard
Shot: Left click
Weapon change: Right click
Move cursor: Mouse movement
Jump: Space
Forward／Backward: ↑ or W／↓ or S
Turn left/right （Move left/right）: ← or A／→or D
Rotation reset: middle click, left/right ctrl
End stage: Press and hold ESC key.
Close description: Z

◆ Key config VR
Shot: Trigger
Weapon change: Grip (right-hand controller)
Move cursor: Left-right controller movement
Jump: Grip (left-hand controller)
Forward／Backward: Joystick or trackpad↑／↓
Turn left/right: Joystick or trackpad ←／→

item.title: Nemire
item.description:
About This Game

Nemire is a daunting union of humanity's mightiest defenders. A symphony of unparalleled skill and cooperation. And they are everything that is wrong with the living. You must raise Undead and destroy greed and power-driven Humans.

You are the Undead

Collect human essence to summon more undead. Slay the greedy humans and challenge their leaders in Turn-based tactical fights. You are the final boss.

Features

  • Turn-based tactical combat
  • Build your squad of ever-evolving undead
  • Random unit traits modify how abilities and standard attacks work
  • Combination of handcrafted and procedurally generated environments
  • Gradually ramping difficulty
  • Meaningful unit progression
  • Impactful abilities

item.title: Super Monsters
item.description:
About This Game

Are you ready to join the monsters gang and take on the ultimate challenge in Super Monsters? Join Bob and others and start jumping, dashing, and dodging your way through a monster invasion like never before!

As a skilled platformer jumper, you'll need to navigate through a variety of levels and stages in the monster world, facing off against challenging obstacles and variety of enemies at every turn. But don't worry – you won't be alone in this quest. With the help of your monster friends, you'll be able to collect coins and power-ups to level up your skills and defeat the monster invasion.

And with bonus levels and power-ups scattered throughout the game, you'll always have something new to discover and challenge yourself with. Whether you're jumping over obstacles, leaping through the air, or rushing and dashing to escape the enemies, you'll feel like a true monster hero as you conquer each level and stage.

But be warned – the super monsters won't go down without a fight! You'll need to stay on your toes and use all your hop and jump skills to make it through to the end. Bob the green monster can collect and throw eggs, making it easier to defeat the enemies.

So what are you waiting for? Join the Super Monster today and embark on the ultimate adventure in this exciting platform game. With many levels containing lots of challenging obstacle to jump and power-ups galore, you'll be hooked from the very first level!

item.title: ArcSine
item.description: About This Game

item.title: Saving Clicklandia
item.description:
About This Game

HISTORY:


An ancient evil has awoken in the Kingdom of Clicklandia and chaos now reigns. The Legendary Dragon has attacked, unleashing terror and disorder upon the once-tranquil realm. The fate of the kingdom and its people hangs in the balance, and only a true hero can stand against the impending disaster.



Do you have what it takes to step into the shoes of this valiant hero? Embark on an epic journey to restore peace and order in Clicklandia. Navigate through treacherous landscapes, confront formidable foes, and unlock your true potential.



As you progress, you'll uncover many abilities, develop beneficial relationships with shopkeepers and witches alike and earn plenty of gold to help you on your journey.



Venture forth, for the Kingdom of Clicklandia relies on your courage and heroism. Will you rise to the challenge and save this world from its darkest hour? Find out and embark on a legendary adventure with Saving Clicklandia today!

Game Features:


Saving Clicklandia is a game in the genre of "match-three" in which you will have to pass numerous tests and fight with formidable bosses. This game is a classic "match-three" with role-playing elements, you can change the appearance of the character, equip the hero in different armor and craft numerous items that will help in battle and give an advantage.



The game features are battles with unique bosses that diversify the gameplay and change the approach to passing.

In addition to battles you can buy useful ingredients to create potions and other auxiliary items.

As you progress through the game, the levels will appear new game elements that develop the gameplay and complicate the passage.



Complete 200 levels
Catchy downloadable Original Soundtrack
Beautiful desktop wallpapers
Earn dozens of achievements
Defeat the formidable bosses
Find new equipment for the character

item.title: Backrooms:Rebirth
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a horror puzzle type game based on the theme of the Backrooms, find an exit in each level to escape here, before you have to keep dodging the pursuit of monsters that are entities, and then open the door through various methods to find props to clear the game, cheer the wanderers.

item.title: Operation Save the Girl: Code X
item.description:
About This Game

An abandoned medieval military base is infested with mutated zombies, and your female boss accidentally enters it while on a mission. Because the zombies are so bad, your female boss is infected by them. You must go and save her. The new boss has given you an order that the female boss must come out smoothly. Are you ready?

This is a first-person shooter game, there are a lot of zombies and props in the game, you need to use these smoothly to rescue the female boss. This is your mission.You need to complete a total of 11 tasks in order to save the female boss.

Game Features:
♦ Female zombies in bikinis, and lots of blood-pumping effects.
♦ Excellent first-person controller, smooth operation.
♦ 3AAA level scene construction, friendly interaction and sound effects.
♦ Wonderful mission, a link link.
♦ Conscientious pricing, can meet your requirements for FPS games.

Game play:
♦ WSAD move character, mouse control perspective.
♦ F Open doors or pick up weapons and supplies.
♦ TAB key can change the language.
♦ 12345 Switch weapon,T shot.

item.title: The Math Problem Killer
item.description:
About This Game

THIS IS A MATH GAME


All you do in this game is solve math problems.

INCREDIBLY DARK AND DISTURBING DESCRIPTIONS OF VIOLENCE


WARNING!!!

The Math Problem Killer is incredibly dark and disturbing. You must listen to recordings made by the Serial Killer. These recordings describe violence against men, women, and children. Only the most courageous Special Agents should attempt to enter the dungeons of the Math Problem Killer.

ENTER DISTUBRING DUNGEONS AND SOLVE THE KILLER'S CREEPY MATH


The main gameplay mechanic of The Math Problem Killer is walking through dungeons and listening to the recordings of a sadistic serial killer recount how he stalked, abducted and tortured his victims., and ultimately solving a math problem based on those disturbing stories. The ultimate goal of each level is to rescue an individual hostage that his being held at the end of the dungeon.

As you walk through the dungeons, the killer will tell you stories about how he abducted or tortured a victim. In his stories there will be facts, such as when he abducted a victim, or how long he followed them, or how long he tortured them, or how long it took them to die. He will then form a math question based on the facts from his stories. Such as...

"I want you to start with Andrea's age, then multiply that by the number of nails I hammered into her husband. Then add the number of minutes I made her hang in my dungeon. Then multiply this number by the number of minutes I tortured Andrea's neighbor."

You will need to listen to all of the recordings in the room in order to gather all of the information required to solve the question. When you do have your answer, you must enter it into the keypad on the door to the next room. If your answer is correct, the door will open and you will repeat the process until you reach the last room with the hostage. If your answer is wrong, then the hostage dies immediately and you must start over.

At its core, The Math Problem Killer is a tense, slow paced, story centric, crime thriller, walking simulator.

A CRIME THRILLER STORY


The Math Problem Killer is a crime thriller. A sadistic serial killer, known as the Math Problem killer has been murdering people in the city of New Columbia. At the request of the mayor and state governor, a federal Serial Killer Task Force arrives to hunt down the Serial Killer. Within days of arrival, the Task Force recieves a communication from the illusive and dangerous killer. He has taken a hostage named Bethany Morgan. He tells the Task Force the hostage location, but he also informs the task force that they may only send one agent inside, and that agent may not have any communication with the outside world.

You are the Task Force Special Agent that is chosen to enter the facility and attempt a rescue of Bethany Morgan. The game takes place over the course of 11 weeks, and follows the Serial Killer Task Force as it attempts to find and apprehend the Math Problem killer. Each week is a new dungeon that must be entered, and a new hostage that must be rescued.

THE KILLER WILL TELL YOU DISTURBING STORIES


The Math Problem Killer is a sadistic and violent monster. He enjoys stalking, and torturing his victims. He also enjoys bragging about his exploits even more. Throughout each dungeon you will find recordings left by the killer. In each recording, he will recount with delight the various methods he employed to capture and torture his victims. You must be prepared to listen to unsettling and disturbing accountings of murder and violence towards, men, women and children. But remember, you are a special agent in the Serial Killer Task Force, and it is your job to rescue the hostage being held in the dungeons.



The Math Problem Killer has placed multiple recordings of pieces of a fact pattern and an accompanying complicated multi-part word problem in each room. The player must listen to the recordings and solve the math word problem that is presented. The answer to the math problem is the door code for the locked door. However, if the player enters a wrong answer the hostage will be immediately killed.

ONE MISTAKE AND THE HOSTAGE DIES


I wont kill the hostage...you will.

The Math Problem Killer does not give you second chances. You must be accurate, or the hostage will die. In each room of each dungeon, you must solve a simple math word problem, and then enter your answer into the keypad on the locked door. If you enter an incorrect code, the hostage you are trying to rescue will be burned alive by hyrdoflouric acid. Think carefully special agent. There is zero margin for error.



A single mistake will kill the hostage and cause the player to fail the level. The Math Problem Killer is a high consequence game in which one mistake will have dire consequences. So think carefully Special Agent.

YOU WILL NEED A PENCIL AND PAPER


In each room of each level, you will need to solve a math word problem, and use the answer as the code to open the locked door to the next room and ultimately the locked box that contains the hostage. The math word problems are not difficult, but you will need to gather the numbers from the disturbing stories told by the killer. Essentially you must gather clues and piece them together in order to figure out the answer. The only way to successfully solve these math problems is utilize a pencil and piece of paper. The player will need to write things down. Because one math mistake, and the hostage dies.

item.title: protoViolence - Definitive Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Can a scientist save a test subject from her life’s work?


A sci-fi/drama visual novel, and a prequel to malViolence.

About:

For over 20 years, Dr. Deidre Destrange produced groundbreaking research on cybernetics under STOP: a world-renowned security organization.

However, her work has led to the birth of STOP’s Youth Training and Development Initiative (YTDI): an unethical program that turns children into powerful cyborg soldiers.

Since Deidre’s legacy founded the YTDI, she believes she has the power to end it.

Will her upcoming case study save STOP from itself?

This visual novel features:

  • ~2 hours of reading time
  • High-quality sprites and CGs: with blinking, speaking and dynamic camera movements
  • Interactive records to explore
  • An original, immersive soundtrack
  • Partial voice acting
  • Accessibility options such as image captions, sound captions, and text legibility functions
  • One ending

item.title: Grow a Carrot
item.description:
About This Game



Ever dreamed about growing carrots? Me neither, however - For a cheap price I present you an indie game where you can plant and harvest carrots, get them from a tree, fight with the carrots slimes and dig carrots out of the Mine.





Make sure to meet all of the bunnies - Some of them are more useful than you could expect



I recommend playing this game on the second screen - as a time killer. Just open Youtube or Twitch, relax, and grow a carrots on the second screen!



"Grow a Carrot" powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5

item.title: Pigmenta
item.description:
About This Game

Pigmenta is an ambient logic puzzle game, where you mix different colored lines to solve puzzles.

The game includes:

  • 48 handcrafted campaign puzzles
  • Time trial mode for those seeking extra challenges
  • Infinite puzzle generator to keep on playing

item.title: Seraphim
item.description:
About This Game


A fast-faced speedrunning platformer where you undermine the righteous angel's unrighteous past. Break through the cute, charming aesthetic to find its sinister undertones. Seraphim was built with a religious fervour for player feel. That means the jump is fine-tuned, the run is tight, and the wings should feel like an extension of your thoughts. Just a warning: this is a DIFFICULT game for platforming veterans! Know what you're getting into!


Master the tricks and the tech in a judgment-free zone. Or, turn on "mock me" mode to be insulted when you mess up! Tame your wings and learn to manoeuvre around traps, steel yourself against brambles, dodge and weave around sinister bosses.


They're sinister. But also the perfect level of cute so you feel bad about hurting them.


  • Forty plus unique, hand-crafted levels
  • An accessible yet engaging narrative
  • Five core areas
  • Secrets and extras (hunt for them if you dare!)
  • A willingness to sacrifice all my artistic principles for a funny joke
  • A bona fide title screen (that's right)
  • An extensive soundtrack to get your blood pumping
  • Many, many spikes and brambles and explosions and occasionally pits
  • Skeletons
  • Closets
  • Skeletons in closets
  • A real pause menu for you pro gamers
  • Configurable settings
  • A writer who doesn't know how to end a list
  • Compromising poses
  • And more!

item.title: Road Engineer
item.description:
About This Game

You are a Road Engineer. Build roads and bridges to lead vehicles to destination.

Different vehicles (car, van, moto, truck, bus), different roads (normal, large, bridge).
Avoid traffic jams, stay under limited cost, optimize time or speed, reach a distance.

Every level is a specific challenge depending on available features, board size, and objectives.
80 levels with progressive difficulty.
A leaderboard by level to compare to best Road Engineers !

item.title: The Hamster's Journey
item.description:
About This Game

The Hamster's Journey is a roguelite platformer about combining hats and pants to overcome the obstacles that get in your way, while being chased by the ominous Hamster's Nightmare.

Throughout the levels, you can unlock and pick up a variety of pants, such as the pogo pants and the skateboard pants, which affect how you move and how you jump. You'll also find hats. These are your actions: Equip the grapple hook hat to swing from the scenery or the dash hat for a quick horizontal burst of speed. There are dozens of unique pairings of hats and pants, and finding a winning combination - or making the most of a bad one - is what The Hamster's Journey is all about!

This is a game about variety of movement, and finding the right tool for the job. But then again, using the worst combinations can sometimes help you find unexpected secrets!

If you make it far enough - and fast enough - you can make it all the way to the end of a world, and unlock the door to the next one. In the end, perhaps the intrepid hamster really can escape and see what's out there in the real world.

item.title: 幸存者幻想曲 Survivor Fantasia
item.description:
About This Game

Game Introduction

"Survivor's Fantasia" is a fast-paced vampire-themed game that combines mild tower defense elements. It features various terrains, traps, and expansive, obstacle-free maps! The game includes a total of 30+ consumable/enhancement items and 50 card items. It also offers 11 adorable pixel characters, 5 combat professions, and over 10 maps in 4 different styles.

Game Features

Traps and Interactive Items: Statues that restore health, spring punches, quicksand, sandstorms... Dodge and utilize these elements to make the game easier!

Simple yet Adjustable Difficulty: The game offers a simple difficulty level where players can progress even without deliberate item combinations. However, players can increase the difficulty by adjusting settings or purchasing items in the game.

Obstacles: Both players and monsters can be obstructed by obstacles. Make use of wall items to prevent monsters from getting too close.

Active Items: Berserk potions, giant potions, shrink potions, life elixirs, and various magic books! Defeat enemies using these items just like in RPG games.

Fast-paced Gameplay: Quick games that last 15 minutes each. There is also a 1.5x speed mode that can be completed in less than 10 minutes. Perfect for a quick gaming session!

item.title: Dead end Exit 8
item.description:
About This Game

Ghost hits the wall

  • Have you heard of this term? Or have you experienced it yourself?
  • You are trapped in an infinite loop from which you may never escape.
  • Hospital! Synonymous with a scary place. There are all kinds of equipment and medicines, and nurses keep appearing.
  • Check everything in the scene carefully to see if it is the same as in your memory.
  • Once you find something is wrong, turn back immediately! Maybe it's not too late.
  • After reaching the eighth floor, you will be able to leave this terrible place
  • Maybe. . . .

This is a game that is very suitable for interacting with fans and barrages

Maybe your fans are better than your eyes?

When the number of positive reviews reaches 200, we will update the second scene, which is also centered around the nightmare scene in our hearts.

The game supports VR mode. Press ESC on the main interface and select VR mode to enter.

  • Before selecting, please make sure you have and connected the VR device.
  • Before choosing, please make sure you have the possibility to take off your VR device.
  • After selecting, you may not be able to take off the VR device.
